name: Acme-Hardesty - Palmitic Acid C16
description: Acme-Hardesty offers high-purity Palmitic Acid (Hexadecanoic Acid, C16) with minimum 98% purity for cosmetic applications. This essential saturated fatty acid is a critical component of the skin's natural lipid barrier, providing barrier repair, emulsification, and thickening properties. Available in several varieties optimized for different industrial and cosmetic processes.
notes: Palmitic acid is essential for the skin's natural lipid barrier and must be present in proper ratios with ceramides and cholesterol (typically 1:1:1) for effective barrier repair. CAS 57-10-3. Multiple varieties available for different formulation needs.
